body: Hi Grasshoppe, Are you trying to re-write Honeybee? ;) There are two solutions. The first one is to mesh the surfaces and then write each surface separately. The second one (which is what honeybee is using in cases like yours) is to connect the corner of the outside curve to the inside curve and split it from there.
